title: Aromatherapy Himalayan Bath Salts - Energy 10oz
cleaned_text: [ Product Description ](#tab-description) Slip into a warm bath with our soothing all natural therapeutic Himalayan salts. Let your muscles relax with this deep tissue bathing sensation and enjoy this blissful moment. Pure essential oils of lemongrass, grapefruit, mandarin, and tangerine are added to help you refresh your tired muscle and leaving your body energized and your spirit strengthened.
